snippet.title: Police appeal for help over 'suspicious' disappearance
snippet.content: Photo: Queensland Police Service Police are appealing for public help to find a man they believe may have disappeared under suspicious circumstances. Sam Robert Price-Purcell, 28, was last seen on Februrary 16, 2015, in the south-east Queensland area. Detective Inspector Damien Hansen of the Homicide Group, State Crime Command said they and his family were concerned for his welfare. "At this stage we are treating this matter as a suspicious disappearance and we are specifically calling for anyone who has information regarding Mr Price-Purcell's movements in early 2015 or his current whereabouts to come forward," Inspector Hansen said. More to come
